excerpt: "Cops can use facial recognition software to identify criminal suspects — but any match is “merely a lead” and not probable cause that someone is connected to a crime, NYPD Commissioner Dermot Shea said Friday. “It is our responsibility to ensure investigators are equipped with effective technologies to bring justice to New Yorkers who ..."
